other_tests.findings: Viable Staphylococcus aureus in biofilm aggregates present on fluid, tissue, and cement samples.
Confirmed the presence of metabolically active Staphylococcus aureus.
Final bacterial cultures showed no growth at multiple time points prior to the final operation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At the final operation, methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus was grown from aspirated joint fluid.
